title: Christmas Papercrafting: Holiday Cards, Gift Tags, and More! (Design Originals) A Paper Crafting Kit in a Book with 50 Greeting Cards, 16 Gift Tags, 18 Mini-Cards, Scrapbook Paper, and Much More
description: It's a holiday papercrafting kit in a book! This treasure trove of Christmas papercrafting Inside Christmas Papercrafting , you'll find everything you need to celebrate the season with festive papercrafts, from greeting cards and mini cards to gift tags and bookmarks, all beautifully illustrated with joyous imagery and merry sentiments. It's so easy to find just the right art card here—perforated, colored, and ready to embellish—that beams with good will and cheerfulness. With a wealth of scrapbook papers, cardstock templates, and frameable art, Christmas Papercrafting is a wonderful resource for every crafter who wants to send their holiday best.
author: Thaneeya McArdle
